title: WordGirl 2x01 A Vote for Becky ; Class Act WS (XviD-MP3_624x352)
description:
Captured with S-Video to DVD Recorder

It looks like there may be enough interest in WordGirl
torrents to warrant a pack. Yeah! Expect the pack to
include episodes 1x05 to 1x10, all the subtitles I have,
and the commercials that I edited out. The extras should
just come in at about 25MB, and the 6 episodes total should
be about 1398 MB. With BT programs like uTorrent you
can pick and choose which episodes you want.

Onto episode 2x01 of WordGirl. Black bars
were cropped from the Widescreen Letterbox broadcast
to make it into widescreen.

Summaries copied from a PBS affiliate online:

A Vote for Becky:
It&#039;s Election Day! Mrs. Botsford is running for
D.A. and Becky is running for student council
president. Tobey decides to run against Becky
and uses his robots to distract WordGirl. How
will Becky win the election and save the city
from total robot destruction?

Class Act:
The Butcher decides that his "wordiability" is
getting in the way of his robbing sprees. So
he enrolls in an adult education class to learn
to articulate. Will the Butcher&#039;s new speech
skills finally give him the advantage he needs
to defeat WordGirl and Captain Huggy Face?
